item.title: The Andrew Cuomo Campaign Is All in on MAGA Influencers
item.description: With the NYC mayoral race coming to a close, Andrew Cuomo is courting right-wing creators.

item.title: Wonder Studios, backed by OpenAI, DeepMind execs, raised $12M to bring AI content to Hollywood
item.description: Wonder will use the fresh funds to double its engineering team and accelerate its push into IP ownership and original content production.

item.title: GoPro Max 2 360 Camera Review: It’s Finally Here
